text:
I have a question regarding how to restrict alpha numeric values being added into a text field we use on a form. This field is mapped to a Salesforce text field but notice some values that are being entered include alpha characters.

I thought with the HubSpot validation property setting it would block alphanumeric characters but its not workingâ€¦ Any suggestions? Is there some customizations that could block these values.?

Thinking something that could be done on the field that could flash an error when a user tries to submit the wrong format.
